# Calculate percentage increase in x

**Jaswinderpal Singh**

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
source("project_funcs.R")
y = 2001:2008
x = c(28, 28, 32.5, 39.5, 45.9, 57.8, 58.1, 62.5)
df = data.frame(y, x)
df
cbind(df, per_inc = round(pinc(x),4))
```
